A oneday event will try bringing relief to Butte County homeless PERIOD

On April  the Silver Dollar Fairgrounds will host Project Homeless Connect an event that includes volunteers and community organizations coming together to bring hundreds of free and necessary services to the Butte County homeless population PERIOD

The goal of this event is to help solve some of the issues that prevent homeless people from getting off the streets PERIOD

Some of the services provided on this day are medical and dental check ups mental health services haircuts and grooming housing applications veteran services clothing and valid California IDs for use in applying for jobs and housing PERIOD

Amelia Storm can be reached at emailprotected or ameliastorm on Twitter
